evolucao.subtitulo: Follow each step of our journey, from the initial idea to today's revolutionary product

janeiro_2024.descricao: The journey began with the vision of creating a platform that could connect people from different cultures and languages naturally and inclusively, breaking language barriers found with exchange students at IFPR - Assis Chateaubriand campus. With this, encouraged by the project advisor, the development of TalkTalk began.

marco_2024.descricao: We initiated the implementation of TalkTalk, using technologies such as Next.js, Socket.IO and VLibras. The system was structured to offer real-time translation, support for multiple languages and adapted visual resources, ensuring an efficient experience for all users.

maio_2024.descricao: We presented TalkTalk at ScientIF – IFPR Scientific and Cultural Exhibition, highlighting its potential to promote inclusion and accessibility in communication. The participation enabled experience exchange, proposal validation and project strengthening in the academic environment.

julho_2024.descricao: TalkTalk was presented at IF-Tech, IFPR's innovation and technology event, as a solution focused on accessibility and digital inclusion. The participation highlighted the system's real-time functionalities and reinforced its role as a transformative educational tool.

setembro_2024.descricao: The first part of TalkTalk was successfully completed, resulting in a functional real-time translation system. This stage represented the core of development, bringing together the main functionalities and defining the project's technical identity.

outubro_2024.descricao: In the second stage, TalkTalk had its focus expanded to include accessibility features, highlighting the integration of sign language translation via VLibras and visual adaptations for different user needs. This phase ensured that the platform became more inclusive, promoting effective communication for everyone.

novembro_2024.descricao: We conducted a test with an exchange student from India to validate the effectiveness of TalkTalk's real-time translation. The experience demonstrated the system's potential in facilitating communication between people of different languages in educational environments. The feedback was positive and reinforced the tool's practical utility.

dezembro_2024.descricao: The TalkTalk project was classified for the virtual stage of FEBIC (Brazilian Fair of Scientific Initiation), recognizing its innovative potential in the area of educational technologies. This achievement highlights the system's relevance on the national scene and encourages the continuity of development and research.

janeiro_2025.descricao: TalkTalk is made available to the public, marking the beginning of a new era in inclusive global communication.
